Html:
Hi, I'm on my first steps in this web world.
I'm using Visual Web Developer 2008 express edition and SQL Server management studio.
I downloaded the zip and open with VWD but I cannot view it in browser:
Server Error in '/Express (VB)' Application.
An attempt to attach an auto-named database for file C:\Users\Zack\Desktop\ClubStarterKit Beta 1\Standard (VB)\ClubStarterKit.Web\App_Data\ClubDB.mdf failed. A database with the same name exists, or specified file cannot be opened, or it is located on UNC share.

Any idea?
Thank you

Having the same trouble. It seems we need access to the server which accepts only people with predefined creds such as username and password, am i right?
in which case, please make a recommendation, would really love to see how this project works :)

Thanks

dglienna wrote:
admin/admin (just read the comments)    

 There is an admin folder but no sub folder or file called admin.

I am having lots of issues running this project.  I am using VS2008, SQL 2005 and have installed and added the Web Deployment Project to this project.  Now when I build the site I get the following error:

" 'Section' is not a member of 'System.Web.UI.UserControl'." for line 9 of Page.aspx.vb.  I looked at the code and I don't see the problem.

This problem occured after I installed the Web Deployment Project and executed a build.

Thank you for your assistance.

Kevin
